title: infected machines
extract: Though they're not a living thing like you and me, computers can get "sick" from viruses, too. A computer virus is a software program designed to replicate itself and spread to other machines. In most cases, the program is "malicious," meaning its purpose is to cause the computer malfunction in some way.Jun 2, 2010
extract_html: Though they're not a living thing like you and me, computers can get "sick" from viruses, too. A computer virus is a software program designed to replicate itself and spread to other machines. In most cases, the program is "malicious," meaning its purpose is to cause the computer malfunction in some way.Jun 2, 2010
